resources.string: Always use the "Open With…" dialog, even when a preferred app has been selected.
The "Open With…" dialog only shows up the first time (Lollipop default).
Also remove the Once/Always buttons, and select the app with a single click.
The Once/Always buttons are shown (Lollipop default).
The launcher icon for "Resolver Activity Tweaks" will be shown.
The launcher icon for Resolver Activity Tweaks" will be hidden. This application can still be launched from the "Xposed Installer".
Copyright © 2015 FifSource Inc.\nFif_ on XDA.\nClick to open the XDA Support Thread.
The Xposed Installer has not been detected. This app is useless without it.
You may just have installed the app.\nOr you forgot to enable the module in the Xposed Installer.\nThis app is useless until you\'ve enabled the module.
The Xposed module has been updated and a reboot is needed.\nPlease reboot.
